JiangConrathComparator - Class in de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lsr.path
Implements the distance measure by JiangConrath (1997) jc(c1,c2) = IC(c1) + IC(c2) - 2* IC( lcs(c1,c2) ) Attention: we convert it into a relatedness measure by using the formula (2 - ( IC(c1) + IC(c2) - 2* IC(lcs(c1,c2)) )) / 2 We then scale it to [0,1] We use intrinisc IC instead of corpus-based IC and transform it into a similarity measure:
JiangConrathComparator(LexicalSemanticResource) - Constructor for class de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lsr.path.JiangConrathComparator
 
JiangConrathComparator(LexicalSemanticResource, Entity) - Constructor for class de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lsr.path.JiangConrathComparator
Initialize comparator with LSR and explicitely set root node.
JiangConrathComparator - Class in de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.wikipedia.measures
Implements the distance measure by JiangConrath (1997) jc(c1,c2) = IC(c1) + IC(c2) - 2* IC( lcs(c1,c2) ) Note that jc returns a distance value rather than a similarity value.
JiangConrathComparator(Wikipedia, CategoryGraph, Measures.Measure, Measures.CombinationStrategy) - Constructor for class de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.wikipedia.measures.JiangConrathComparator
